column1: Management scenario: Typical private land activities

column2: In the absence of positive management, I would expect some decline in diversity.
Introduction of some management, and particularly burning and weed control, will be likely to increase forb diversity a bit
Active management will include re-introduction of forbs, and is likely to lead to a slightlly inflated diversity compared to natural situation
